prod_long_desc:
Kit out your mini-doll figures in Disney Princess style with the LEGO® l Disney Mini-Doll Dress-Up Kit, featuring a buildable sewing machine, dressing table, vanity table with chair and a clothes rack, plus assorted accessory elements. Use this kit to customize your LEGO® l Disney sets and inspire even more role-play fun.
Features various small builds including a sewing studio with buildable sewing machine, dressing table, vanity table with chair, clothes rack, 4 fabric capes and a fabric skirt to fit a mini-doll (not included), plus assorted accessory elements.
The perfect addition to your LEGO® l Disney play sets.
Combine with the 40307 Castle Interior Kit to create even more play possibilities for your LEGO® l Disney sets.
